        Parameters:

      • getUpgradeState

        UpgradeState getUpgradeState()
        Returns:
        the upgrade state. Valid values: NONE - means that component is installed and good to go, no upgrade in progress IN_PROGRESS - means that component is being upgraded COMPLETE - means that component has reported a correct new version during upgrade FAILED - means that failed and component did not get upgraded VERSION_MISMATCH - means that component reported unexpected version

      • getComponentAdminState

        HostComponentAdminState getComponentAdminState()

      • setComponentAdminState

      • convertToResponse

        ServiceComponentHostResponse convertToResponse(Map<String,DesiredConfig> desiredConfigs)
        Builds a ServiceComponentHostResponse.
        Parameters:
        desiredConfigs - the desired configurations for the cluster. Obtaining these can be expensive and since this method operates on SCH's, it could be called 10,000's of times when generating cluster/host responses. Therefore, the caller should build these once and pass them in. If null, then this method will retrieve them at runtime, incurring a performance penality.
        Returns:

      • convertToResponseStatusOnly

      • recalculateHostVersionState

                                       throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Updates an existing HostVersionEntity for the desired repository of this component, or create one if it doesn't exist.
